title: What can I do to satisfy my curiosity, that I couldn't do before if I have a lot of money? - Quora

response.answer_text: Travel. Visit not just the great capitols and palaces of the world, but the temples, cathedrals, and mosques as well. Visit the world’s great museums. See historical sights. View the great natural wonders of the world (while they are still here). As Mark Twain one said,  “Travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.”
